Package it.unicam.cs.pa.environment.shapes

Interface ShapeFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseShapeFactory
public interface ShapeFactory
An interface representing a factory for creating instances of various shapes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Shape
    createShape(String label, ShapeType shapeType, double[] args)
    Creates a shape based on the provided parameters.

  • Method Details

    • createShape

      Shape createShape(String label, ShapeType shapeType, double[] args)
      Creates a shape based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      label - The label for the shape.
      shapeType - The type of shape to create (e.g., "CIRCLE", "RECTANGLE").
      args - The arguments needed to create the shape.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the specified shape.
